original_title: PJ Harvey: Let England Shake - 12 Short Films By Seamus Murphy
overview: All songs are featured on the album Let England Shake.  1 	Let England Shake  2 	The Last Living Rose  3 	The Glorious Land  4 	The Words That Maketh Murder  5 	All And Everyone  6 	On Battleship Hill  7 	England  8 	In The Dark Places  9 	Bitter Branches  10 	Hanging In The Wire  11 	Written On The Forehead  12 	The Colour Of The Earth  13 	England - Solo Version
title: PJ Harvey: Let England Shake - 12 Short Films By Seamus Murphy
